verses.name: Genesis 41:48
verses.text: And he gathered up all the food of the seven years, which were in the land of Egypt, and laid up the food in the cities: the food of the field, which was round about every city, laid he up in the same.

verses.name: Genesis 41:49
verses.text: And Joseph gathered corn as the sand of the sea, very much, until he left numbering; for it was without number.

verses.name: Genesis 41:50
verses.text: And unto Joseph were born two sons before the years of famine came, which Asenath the daughter of Poti–pherah priest of On bare unto him.
